Polytech Industries

Expertise in Structural Foam Molding. Delivering precision and durability, tailored for niche demands.

Our Services

Design & Discovery

Embark on your project's journey with our comprehensive turn-key process. Delve deep into tailored solutions, encompassing consults, material and insert selection, and design evaluation.

Engineering & Tooling

Our tailored tooling solutions guarantee efficiency and quality, regardless of your production needs.

Low Pressure Molding

Low Pressure Molding at Polytech is the epitome of precision engineering and beauty, specially crafted for low-volume projects where every detail counts.

Quality Assurance

Leveraging state-of-the-art techniques, every product undergoes meticulous quality checks, upholding our reputation for unmatched reliability.

Finishing & Assembly

Beyond molding, we offer comprehensive post-production services, delivering a product that's ready for the market.

Project Management

Streamline your product vision with Polytech's Turn-Key Manufacturing service. From your initial design, we manage the entire process, providing prototype parts for validation and refinement, ensuring the final product matches your expectations.

View All Services

Experts in Structural Foam Molding.

  • Specialized in high-durability and premium finish products.
  • Efficient integration of metallic inserts during the molding process.
  • Commitment to on-time delivery and consistent product reliability.
  • Experience a blend of expert craftsmanship and a personal touch.
About Us

Our Projects

Evolv Express

At the forefront of modern security innovations, Polytech proudly contributes to the Evolv Express® system implemented at iconic venues like Sofi Stadium and YouTube Theater. Our precision-molded components stand resilient, ensuring that the system efficiently safeguards hundreds of thousands of NFL fans every week.

Invivo Orthopedic Coils

Empowering advanced orthopedic diagnostics with the invivo Orthopedic coils by Dunlee. Polytech collaborates in designs that prioritize patient comfort, accelerated image acquisition, and heightened diagnostic value.

View All Projects
